sense.name: revolve
sense.examples: Vultures wheeled above the carcass. They wheeled their horses around and left. The drunkard wheeled from the bouncer's fist, then hit the ground. Some dogs wheel 3 times before laying down. Seagulls wheel incessantly around the docks.

sense.name: turn around
sense.examples: The farmer wheeled his cart to face away from the sun The boy wheeled suddenly, causing the eggs to leap from his pan. The victim wheeled to face her attackers. Cooks do not wheel suddenly in the kitchen as a safety precaution. I wheeled in surprise when my butt was pinched.

sense.name: move along on wheels
sense.examples: The President's car wheeled down the road. The cyclist wheeled through the marathon. The servants wheeled the serving tables out to the dining hall. Farmers wheel their goods to the market every Saturday. CU students brazenly wheel through campus on skateboards.
